snippet: T-Mobile USA is the one major carrier in the United States that has not had a deal with Apple to sell iPhones to its customers. But it is aiming to take advantage of the iPhone by introducing a marketing campaign aimed at people who want to bring...
abstract: T-Mobile USA is the one major carrier in the United States that has not had a deal with Apple to sell iPhones to its customers. But it is aiming to take advantage of the iPhone by introducing a marketing campaign aimed at people who want to bring older versions of the iPhone to T-Mobile's network.

headline.main: T-Mobile USA Says Bring Us Your iPhones
